column4: fade i want to use my webcam to take photos like  in an apple notebook
fade can you help me to get my webcam to work so i can take pictures with it?
with the camera
its built in like i said before
im using a laptop with a built in camera on top of the screen
hp dv9000
yea
i tried to use camorama
coulnt connect to the video device
/dev/video0
try `dmesg | grep camera`
that needs to be run in bash/terminal.
nothing happened, should i try as root?
no
any other suggestions?
So there isn't any way to unplug the webcam and plug it in.. that would make this easier.
lol no, im using a laptop its built into de screen
right. How about replace camera with video and try running that?
didnt understand..
`dmesg|grep video'
your webcam should work. Now type in `sudo apt-get install cheese` (or is cheese preinstalled?)
